statements: SELECT * FROM academic_fraud_detection;
SELECT student_id, submission_date FROM academic_fraud_detection WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT submission_id, submission_text FROM academic_fraud_detection WHERE submission_id > 50;
SELECT student_id, submission_text FROM academic_fraud_detection WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, submission_id, submission_date, submission_text FROM academic_fraud_detection ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM academic_fraud_detection WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, submission_date FROM academic_fraud_detection WHERE submission_id > 100 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_submissions FROM academic_fraud_detection WHERE submission_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT submission_id, LENGTH(submission_text) AS text_length FROM academic_fraud_detection WHERE LENGTH(submission_text) > 500 ORDER BY text_length ASC;
SELECT student_id, submission_id, submission_date FROM academic_fraud_detection WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND submission_date BETWEEN '2023-03-01' AND '2023-04-01';
SELECT * FROM Student_Submissions;
SELECT student_id, submission_text FROM Student_Submissions WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT submission_text FROM Student_Submissions WHERE submission_id = 5;
SELECT student_id, submission_text, submission_id FROM Student_Submissions ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT original_submission_id, detected_submission_id, plagiarism_score FROM Plagiarism_Detections WHERE plagiarism_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Student_Submissions WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Student_Submissions WHERE submission_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT MAX(plagiarism_score) AS highest_plagiarism_score FROM Plagiarism_Detections;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(submission_id) AS num_submissions FROM Student_Submissions GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT AVG(plagiarism_score) AS avg_plagiarism_score FROM Plagiarism_Detections WHERE detection_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM Students LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_name, submission_date FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, submission_date FROM Students ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT submission_text FROM Submissions WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, submission_date, plagiarism_score FROM Students INNER JOIN PlagiarismDetect ON Students.student_id = PlagiarismDetect.submission_id1;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, submission_date FROM Students ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT s.student_name, sd.submission_text FROM Students s JOIN Submissions sd ON s.student_id = sd.student_id;

SELECT p.plagiarism_score, s1.submission_text AS submission_1, s2.submission_text AS submission_2 FROM PlagiarismDetect p JOIN Submissions s1 ON p.submission_id1 = s1.submission_id JOIN Submissions s2 ON p.submission_id2 = s2.submission_id;

SELECT s.student_name, COUNT(sd.submission_id) AS submission_count FROM Students s LEFT JOIN Submissions sd ON s.student_id = sd.student_id GROUP BY s.student_name HAVING submission_count > 0 ORDER BY submission_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, submission_text FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT submission_id, plagiarism_score FROM Submissions ORDER BY plagiarism_score DESC;

SELECT student_name, plagiarism_detected FROM Students JOIN Submissions ON Students.student_id = Submissions.student_id JOIN PlagiarismReports ON Submissions.submission_id = PlagiarismReports.submission_id;
SELECT submission_id, submission_date, detection_date FROM Submissions JOIN DetectionHistory ON Submissions.submission_id = DetectionHistory.submission_id ORDER BY detection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, submission_text FROM Students JOIN Submissions ON Students.student_id = Submissions.student_id;
SELECT submission_date, plagiarism_score FROM Submissions WHERE plagiarism_score > 0.5;

SELECT Students.student_name, PlagiarismReports.plagiarism_detected FROM Students LEFT JOIN Submissions ON Students.student_id = Submissions.student_id LEFT JOIN PlagiarismReports ON Submissions.submission_id = PlagiarismReports.submission_id;
SELECT student_id, submission_date, detection_date FROM Submissions JOIN DetectionHistory ON Submissions.submission_id = DetectionHistory.submission_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_due_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT submission_text FROM Submissions WHERE submission_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_name, activity_description, activity_date FROM SuspiciousActivity ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT submission_text FROM Submissions WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, original_submission_id, plagiarism_percentage FROM PlagiarismReports WHERE plagiarism_percentage >= 20 ORDER BY plagiarism_percentage DESC;
